maml:description.maml:para: Get the user account, protected by AdminSDHolder container.

Function gets Active Directory user accounts, protected by AdminSDHolder. It returns Name, SamAccountName, UserPrincipalName, whether account is enabled, adminCount attribute value, whether access rights inheritance is enabled and list of protected groups the user is member of.

maml:Description.maml:para: Specifies pattern for ambiguous name resolution.
Specifies value to search by SamAccountName atttribute.
Specifies value to search by UserPrincipalName atttribute.
Specifies pattern for ambiguous name resolution.
Specifies value to search by SamAccountName atttribute.
Specifies value to search by UserPrincipalName atttribute.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 1 --------------------------

dev:remarks.maml:para: The command returns information about user accounts, protected by AdminSDHolder container. Output includes disabled user accounts.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 2 --------------------------

dev:remarks.maml:para: The command returns information about user accounts, protected by AdminSDHolder container. Output includes only enabled user accounts.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 3 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
Get-sthAdminSDHolderProtectedUserAccount -ANR u
Name SamAccountName UserPrincipalName Enabled AdminCountAttribute InheritanceEnabled AdminSDHolderGroups ---- -------------- ----------------- ------- ------------------- ------------------ ------------------- user user user@domain.com True 1 False {Account Operators}

dev:remarks.maml:para: The commands return information about user accounts, protected by AdminSDHolder container, using ambiguous name resolution.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 4 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
Get-sthAdminSDHolderProtectedUserAccount -SamAccountName user
Name SamAccountName UserPrincipalName Enabled AdminCountAttribute InheritanceEnabled AdminSDHolderGroups ---- -------------- ----------------- ------- ------------------- ------------------ ------------------- user user user@domain.com True 1 False {Account Operators}

dev:remarks.maml:para: The command returns information about user account, protected by AdminSDHolder container, using SamAccountName user object attribute.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 5 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
Get-sthAdminSDHolderProtectedUserAccount -UserPrincipalName user@domain.com
Name SamAccountName UserPrincipalName Enabled AdminCountAttribute InheritanceEnabled AdminSDHolderGroups ---- -------------- ----------------- ------- ------------------- ------------------ ------------------- user user user@domain.com True 1 False {Account Operators}

dev:remarks.maml:para: The command returns information about user account, protected by AdminSDHolder container, using UserPrincipalName user object attribute.

maml:description.maml:para: Removes adminCount attribute and enables access rules inheritance for user object.
Function removes adminCount attribute and enables access rules inheritance for the user object, that no longer belongs to groups, protected by AdminSDHolder container.

maml:Description.maml:para: Specifies value to search by SamAccountName atttribute.
Specifies value to search by UserPrincipalName atttribute.
Specifies value to search by SamAccountName atttribute.
Specifies value to search by UserPrincipalName atttribute.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 1 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
Remove-sthAdminSDHolderUserAccountProtection -SamAccountName user -Remove -YesRemove
Removing adminCount attribute and enabling access rules inheritance.
Name SamAccountName UserPrincipalName Enabled AdminCountAttribute InheritanceEnabled AdminSDHolderGroups ---- -------------- ----------------- ------- ------------------- ------------------ ------------------- user user user@domain.com True 1 False {}
adminCount attribute removed. Access rules inheritance enabled.

dev:remarks.maml:para: The command removes adminCount attribute and enables access rules inheritance for the user account. The account was specified by using its SamAccountName.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 2 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
Remove-sthAdminSDHolderUserAccountProtection -UserPrincipalName user@domain.com -Remove -YesRemove
Removing adminCount attribute and enabling access rules inheritance.
Name SamAccountName UserPrincipalName Enabled AdminCountAttribute InheritanceEnabled AdminSDHolderGroups ---- -------------- ----------------- ------- ------------------- ------------------ ------------------- user user user@domain.com True 1 False {}
adminCount attribute removed. Access rules inheritance enabled.

dev:remarks.maml:para: The command removes adminCount attribute and enables access rules inheritance for the user account. The account was specified by using its UserPrincipalName.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 3 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
Remove-sthAdminSDHolderUserAccountProtection -SamAccountName username -Remove -YesRemove
Account is a member of AdminSDHolder protected groups.
Name SamAccountName UserPrincipalName Enabled AdminCountAttribute InheritanceEnabled AdminSDHolderGroups ---- -------------- ----------------- ------- ------------------- ------------------ ------------------- user user user@domain.com True 1 False {Account Operators}
No changes were made.

dev:remarks.maml:para: The command does not make changes to user account, because it still is a member of a protected group.

maml:description.maml:para: Get the groups, protected by AdminSDHolder container.
Function gets the Active Directory groups, protected by AdminSDHolder container. It returns dsHeuristics attribute value, protected groups, and also groups, excluded from protection, if any.

maml:Description.maml:para: For use by other module functions.
For use by other module functions.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 1 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
Get-sthAdminSDHolderGroup
dsHeuristics: null
Protected Groups:
Name SID distinguishedName ---- --- ----------------- Account Operators S-1-5-32-548 CN=Account Operators,CN=Builtin,DC=domain,DC=com Administrators S-1-5-32-544 CN=Administrators,CN=Builtin,DC=domain,DC=com Backup Operators S-1-5-32-551 CN=Backup Operators,CN=Builtin,DC=domain,DC=com Domain Admins S-1-5-21-1234567890-1234567890-1234567890-512 CN=Domain Admins,CN=Users,DC=domain,DC=com Domain Controllers S-1-5-21-1234567890-1234567890-1234567890-516 CN=Domain Controllers,CN=Users,DC=domain,DC=com Enterprise Admins S-1-5-21-1234567890-1234567890-1234567890-519 CN=Enterprise Admins,CN=Users,DC=domain,DC=com Print Operators S-1-5-32-550 CN=Print Operators,CN=Builtin,DC=domain,DC=com Read-only Domain Controllers S-1-5-21-1234567890-1234567890-1234567890-521 CN=Read-only Domain Controllers,CN=Users,DC=domain,DC=com Replicator S-1-5-32-552 CN=Replicator,CN=Builtin,DC=domain,DC=com Schema Admins S-1-5-21-1234567890-1234567890-1234567890-518 CN=Schema Admins,CN=Users,DC=domain,DC=com Server Operators S-1-5-32-549 CN=Server Operators,CN=Builtin,DC=domain,DC=com

dev:remarks.maml:para: The command gets the value of dsHeuristics attribute and a list of groups, protected by AdminSDHolder container.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 2 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
Get-sthAdminSDHolderGroup
dsHeuristics: 000000000100000f
Protected Groups:
Name SID distinguishedName ---- --- ----------------- Administrators S-1-5-32-544 CN=Administrators,CN=Builtin,DC=domain,DC=com Domain Admins S-1-5-21-1234567890-1234567890-1234567890-512 CN=Domain Admins,CN=Users,DC=domain,DC=com Domain Controllers S-1-5-21-1234567890-1234567890-1234567890-516 CN=Domain Controllers,CN=Users,DC=domain,DC=com Enterprise Admins S-1-5-21-1234567890-1234567890-1234567890-519 CN=Enterprise Admins,CN=Users,DC=domain,DC=com Read-only Domain Controllers S-1-5-21-1234567890-1234567890-1234567890-521 CN=Read-only Domain Controllers,CN=Users,DC=domain,DC=com Replicator S-1-5-32-552 CN=Replicator,CN=Builtin,DC=domain,DC=com Schema Admins S-1-5-21-1234567890-1234567890-1234567890-518 CN=Schema Admins,CN=Users,DC=domain,DC=com
Excluded Groups:
Name SID distinguishedName ---- --- ----------------- Account Operators S-1-5-32-548 CN=Account Operators,CN=Builtin,DC=domain,DC=com Server Operators S-1-5-32-549 CN=Server Operators,CN=Builtin,DC=domain,DC=com Print Operators S-1-5-32-550 CN=Print Operators,CN=Builtin,DC=domain,DC=com Backup Operators S-1-5-32-551 CN=Backup Operators,CN=Builtin,DC=domain,DC=com

dev:remarks.maml:para: The command gets the value of dsHeuristics attribute and a list of groups protected by AdminSDHolder container. Also function returns the list of groups, excluded from protection by virtue of 16'th character's value of dsHeuristics attribute.

maml:description.maml:para: Disables protection by AdminSDHolder container for specified groups.
Function disables protection by AdminSDHolder container for Account Operators, Server Operators, Print Operators or Backup Operators groups.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 1 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
Disable-sthAdminSDHolderGroupProtection -AccountOperators -Disable -YesDisable
Current dsHeuristics value: null
DISABLED: Account Operators
Resulting dsHeuristics value: 0000000001000001

dev:remarks.maml:para: The command disables protection by AdminSDHolder container for Account Operators group.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 2 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
Disable-sthAdminSDHolderGroupProtection -AccountOperators -ServerOperators -PrintOperators -BackupOperators -Disable -YesDisable
Current dsHeuristics value: null
DISABLED: Account Operators DISABLED: Server Operators DISABLED: Print Operators DISABLED: Backup Operators
Resulting dsHeuristics value: 000000000100000f

dev:remarks.maml:para: The command disables protection by AdminSDHolder container for Account Operators, Server Operators, Print Operators and Backup Operators groups.

maml:description.maml:para: Enables protection by AdminSDHolder container for specified groups.
Function enables protection by AdminSDHolder container for Account Operators, Server Operators, Print Operators or Backup Operators groups.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 1 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
Enable-sthAdminSDHolderGroupProtection -AccountOperators -Enable -YesEnable
Current dsHeuristics value: 000000000100000f
ENABLED: Account Operators
Resulting dsHeuristics value: 000000000100000e

dev:remarks.maml:para: The command enables protection by AdminSDHolder container for Account Operators group.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 2 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
Enable-sthAdminSDHolderGroupProtection -AccountOperators -ServerOperators -PrintOperators -BackupOperators -Enable -YesEnable
Current dsHeuristics value: 000000000100000f
ENABLED: Account Operators ENABLED: Server Operators ENABLED: Print Operators ENABLED: Backup Operators
Resulting dsHeuristics value: 0000000001000000

dev:remarks.maml:para: The command enables protection by AdminSDHolder container for Account Operators, Server Operators, Print Operators and Backup Operators groups.
